Le rachat de crédit pour les fonctionnai: The purchase of credit for civil servants allows state agents who have taken out loans reserved for civil servants to consolidate all their claims in one monthly payment. Credit redemption simplifies budget management while reducing the amount of monthly payments.
Le crédit fonctionnaire, un emprunt rése: The official loan, a loan reserved for state agents
Le crédit fonctionnaire est un produit b: The official loan is a real estate banking product reserved for public servants of the State, territorial or hospital. It is specifically designed to allow public servants, who do not benefit from the 1% employer loan, to finance the purchase of their principal residence, whether new or old, with or without work. The official credit has several advantages :
-La caution peut être prise en charge pa: The deposit can be taken care of by the employee's professional mutual  ;
-Le montant de l’assurance est moins che: The amount of insurance is cheaper than in a conventional loan ;
Il permet à l’emprunteur de conserver se: It allows the borrower to retain his rights to the Personalized Housing Assistance (APL), if he has it.
Le taux d’emprunt du crédit fonctionnair: The borrowing rate of the official credit, meanwhile, is identical to, or slightly higher than that of the market. However it is capped at 7%. To benefit, the borrower must first have a Social Action Loan (PAS), or a loan agreement. He can then apply for a loan from Crédit Foncier de France, the only organization authorized to distribute this product. The different professional mutuals of the public service take care of them, the guarantee and credit insurance for the borrower.
Simplifier la gestion de ses emprunts gr: Simplify the management of its loans through the repurchase of credit
Le rachat de crédit est un moyen simple: The purchase of credit is a simple and advantageous way to optimize the management of its budget, to preserve its purchasing power or avoid the risk of over-indebtedness. To obtain the greatest benefit, you must have taken out at least three loans, for example:
Plutôt que d’avoir des prélèvements mult: Rather than having multiple withdrawals, at various installments on his account, a credit redemption makes it possible to group all the debts contracted in a single monthly payment. This is particularly beneficial for revolving consumer loans, which have very high interest rates and are very difficult to get rid of. By consolidating all borrowings into one single rate comparable to the market rate, with only one insurance, and by extending the term of the debt, the redemption of credit can reduce the amount of its monthly repayments by more than 50%. It is therefore a particularly effective solution to free up a higher monthly budget, regain purchasing power for current expenses, and have a more secure visibility over time of its bank accounts and receivables.

L’agriculture est un secteur d’activité: Agriculture is a separate sector of activity. From his installation to his retirement, the farmer must invest regularly to maintain his productivity and the banks do not always respond. But another solution is offered to farmers: credit without a bank. This option makes it possible to obtain the necessary funds without going through a bank.
Faire vivre une exploitation agricole co: Farming a farm is expensive. The farmer needs a large sum from the moment of his installation to finance the acquisition of lands, equipment and buildings in particular. But this is just a starting point. After several years working on the farm, he will have to replace some machines by investing for example in a combine or a tractor more modern and more efficient. Farmers must also deal with climate hazards. In some black years, they may need funds to limit cash flow problems. To meet all these needs, many are choosing credit.
POURQUOI CHOISIR UN CRÉDIT SANS BANQUE ?: WHY CHOOSE A CREDIT WITHOUT A BANK?
Le statut des agriculteurs peut effrayer: The status of farmers can scare the banks. Indeed, banking organizations often prefer to lend to people with stable incomes. Farmers who suffer from climate uncertainties, harvests or commodity prices are finding it more difficult to obtain loans. But other possibilities exist. Bankless credit is a financing solution for farmers. On the principle of crowdfunding, the farmer benefits from the savings of private investors, relieved of bank charges. This mode of win-win borrowing ensures a fair rate, quick response and avoids hidden fees!

Légalement, tout citoyen a le droit de: Legally, every citizen has the right to subscribe a consumer credit from a bank or credit company. The decision whether or not to grant financing nevertheless belongs to the lending institution, based on a detailed analysis of the creditworthiness of the borrower. It is therefore logical that individuals with regular incomes and professional stability form the bulk of the clientele of credit professionals.
D’autres profils, jugés plus \"risqués\": Other profiles, considered more "risky", are somewhat removed from the consumer credit market. Farmers fall into this category because of the many uncertainties that weigh on their profession and their incomes.
